title: Verifying your route when traveling
context: Ask someone if you are currently walking in the right direction.

content.bestLine: Am I heading in the right direction?

neutral.text: Is this the way to downtown?
Can you tell me if I'm on the right track?
Do I need to turn anywhere soon?
Am I close to the city center?
Is this street part of the main route?
Can you confirm I'm going the right way?
How far am I from the nearest landmark?

informal.text: Hey, is this the right way to go?
Do you think I'm headed in the right direction?
Got any idea if I'm on the right path?
Mind telling me if I'm close to where I need to be?
Should I just keep walking and see where I end up?
Do you live around here? Can you help me out?
I'm totally lost, can you point me in the right direction?
Excuse me, do you know where I am?

formal.text: Excuse me, could you please tell me if I'm on the correct route?
I would appreciate it if you could confirm my direction.
Could you kindly inform me if I am approaching my destination?
Is it possible for you to direct me to the nearest major intersection?
I am trying to get to the city center, could you advise me on the best route?
Would you be so kind as to tell me if I am walking in the right direction?

patterns.meaning: Asking for confirmation of the direction

patterns.template: Can you tell me if I'm [options]?
patterns.meaning: Seeking information about the current location or direction

lines.speaker: Traveler
lines.text: Excuse me, am I heading in the right direction?

lines.speaker: Passerby
lines.text: Yes, you're on the right track. Just keep walking straight for about three blocks.

lines.speaker: Visitor
lines.text: Hi, I'm trying to get to the city center. Can you tell me if I'm on the right path?

lines.speaker: Local
lines.text: Actually, you need to turn left up ahead. I can give you a map if you'd like.
